headline.main: NAZIS COURT TURKS WITH PEACE PLEDGE; Istanbul Hears Papen Stresses Aim for Amity in Plea for Aid to 'New Order' BUT SKEPTICISM REMAINS Subtle Attempt to Separate Ankara From Britain Is Seen in Diplomacy
